item.title: Fearlessly Ask Stupid Questions - Dev Leader Weekly 107
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss how asking stupid questions contributes to a stronger engineering culture. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/08/30/fearlessly-ask-stupid-questions-dev-leader-weekly-107

item.title: Top Mistakes of New Managers and Leads - Dev Leader Weekly 106
